summary: The first Scythe you got in game when playing Darksiders 2
descriptionHtml:
Darksiders II Skull Scythe


Another scythe and sickle from the game Darksiders II, these one are those you begin the game with.
They appear in the movie trailer too as Death main weapon.
Textures are 2048 px.


You got one handed and two handed versions.
The stats are little above Daedric.

You can craft them, uprade them in any forge and enchant them of course.


-Installation:

The file should be NMM ready.If any trouble occurs let me know.
Or you just can put the content of the archive in your data folder and activate the esp through the launcher.


-Desintallation:
The contrary of above.

Update: 2013/02/05
Watch a video of this in action here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=_icNrTKh0N8
Courtesy of RaygenHD.Thanks to him.

Update: 2013/01/23
Just playing in 3Dsmax and decided to mod this and add optional sword and greatsword for people who prefer this kind of weapon.
Just download in the optional section. You don't need the main mod for this to work.
These are just a little more powerful than daedric conterparts, craftable, upgradable and enchantable.

Update 2017/06/24:
The mod is up to skyrim special edtion , thans to XvomTheMad:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10551/?


-Credits:

Bethesda for Skyrim
Vigil Game and THQ for Darksiders II (R.I.P.)

Please, do not upload this on any other site than Skyrim Nexus.
If you want to modify these files, PM me first.

Have fun..

AthenaX
author: AthenaX
